title: Design, synthesis, and antiproliferative screening of new quinoline derivatives bearing a cis-vinyl triamide motif as apoptosis activators and EGFR-TK inhibitors
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,24781-24790
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA04915B, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Hany M. Abd El-Lateef, Ahmed Gaafar Ahmed Gaafar, Arwa Sultan Alqahtani, Aamal A. Al-Mutairi, Dalal Sulaiman Alshaya, Fahmy Gad Elsaid, Eman Fayad, N. A. Farouk
A set of novel quinoline tethered cis-vinyl triamides derivatives has been designed, synthesized and screened for in vitro cytotoxicity against the MCF-7 breast adenocarcinoma cell line.
